NAME:
   getenvoy run - Runs Envoy and collects process state on exit. Available builds can be retrieved using `getenvoy list`.

USAGE:
   getenvoy run [command options] <reference> [-- <envoy-args>]

DESCRIPTION:
   # Run using a manifest reference.
   getenvoy run ENVOY_VERSION -- --config-path ./bootstrap.yaml
   
   # List available Envoy flags.
   getenvoy run ENVOY_VERSION -- --help

OPTIONS:
   --help, -h  show help (default: false)
